title: Rabblerouser

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, choose two players to Spite. They remain Spited until they die.
- Spited players will attack other Spited players they visit.
- If two Spited players visit each other, they will be cleaned and deal powerful attacks instead.
- If two Spited players visit the same target, they will attack each other.

fields.name: Destiny:
fields.value: Have 3 people die because you Spited them.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have each living Peasant fulfill their Destiny.

desc:
Post 4434
*The whispers continued. They maddened the Rabblerouser, like a horsefly chopping up his flesh. He heard everything his masters said in private. He plotted in silence, sending letters and threats. The next time the doctor visited that old sheriff, scalpel in hand, he knew why it would return bloody.*
